question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. "Broadway" sign
B. board that says "The Event"
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The "Broadway" sign is mounted on a pole closer to the camera's viewpoint, while "The Event" board is further back on a building facade, making the depth relationship visually clear.
